events.comment:
Version: 1.0.0
Author: Ulises Freitas<ulises.freitas@gmail.com>
Web: https://github.com/UlisesFreitas/WTF-Wars-Rhythm

Welcome to World Trade Fun Wars series this time Rhythm Edition - A very simple music game
Controls:
AWSD for player 1
LEFT,RIGHT,UP,DOWN for player 2
Enter for start the game
R - Restart anytime

Almost all the variables of the game are defined in the GameScene as an structure variable so it's easy to understand
All the objects are separated in tags so it's easy to filter not relevant for this example but if you plan a bigger game based on this template well is already there for you to easily add more objects.

Layers:
Base Layer Almost all the objects are placed here exept for the texts.
Hud - Some texts here
Gameover: The game over objects WinLose
Here calculate the offset of the current playing song the in order to stop the spawning arrows set the bool StopSpawn to true
Remember: AWSD for control this player
Set the number of arrows to spawn in this turn
Create up to 1 arrow every 0.5 seconds

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Ulises Freitas<ulises.freitas@gmail.com>
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
Choose from list of given string of values and return one of the randomly
#How to use it
Create a new variable of the type you want Number/String then go to Functions and select Choose::RandomString or Choose::RandomNumber and set the values you want to randomize separated by commas.
Done.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.fullName: Choose from list of given string of values and return one of the randomly
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Choose
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Choose a random value given a list of them

eventsFunctions.description: Choose a random value between these strings
eventsFunctions.name: RandomString

parameters.description: Write the string you want to randomize separated by commas
parameters.name: ChooseString

eventsFunctions.description: Choose a random value between these numbers
eventsFunctions.name: RandomNumber

parameters.description: Write the numbers you want to randomize separated by commas
parameters.name: ChoosedNumbersString

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: VegeTato, arthuro555
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Convenience conditions, actions and behaviors for timers to trigger a condition every X seconds.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: RepeatEveryXSeconds
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: This allows to trigger an event every X seconds.

parameters.description: The name of the timer to loop
parameters.name: timerName

parameters.description: The time in seconds between each trigger
parameters.name: time

eventsFunctions.description: Triggers every X seconds X amount of times.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Repeat every X seconds in X number
eventsFunctions.name: RepeatXTimes

parameters.description: The name of the timer to loop
parameters.name: timerName

parameters.description: The time in seconds between each trigger
parameters.name: time

parameters.longDescription: The condition will trigger at most this amount of times. Make it -1 for looping forever.
parameters.name: limit

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Allows to repeat an object timer every X seconds.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: RepeatTimer

eventsFunctions.description: Triggers every X seconds, where X is defined in the behavior properties.
eventsFunctions.name: Repeat

eventsFunctions.description: Allows to trigger the recurring timer X times again.
eventsFunctions.name: ResetLimit
eventsFunctions.sentence: Allow to trigger the recurring timer _PARAM1_ of _PARAM0_ X times again

propertyDescriptors.label: The name of the timer to repeat
propertyDescriptors.name: TimerName

propertyDescriptors.label: The time between each trigger (in seconds)
propertyDescriptors.name: TimerLength

propertyDescriptors.label: How many times should the timer trigger? -1 for forever.
propertyDescriptors.name: Limit
